title: Nike Air More Uptempo
description: Keeping the exaggerated, graffiti-styled "AIR" graphics and the full-length Nike Air cushioning you love from the original, your favourite hoops look gets transformed into an easy on/easy off slide. Pairing '90s style with summertime comfort, its plush strap, airy perforations and soft foam make it a perfect choiceâ€”courtside, beachside and anywhere in between.
